flavor_text_entries: The more Pikachu loves its Trainer, the greater the move's power. It never misses.

Buzzy buzz.name: Buzzy buzz
flavor_text_entries: The user shoots a jolt of electricity to attack the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Sizzly slide.name: Sizzly slide
flavor_text_entries: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This also leaves the target with a burn.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Glitzy glow.name: Glitzy glow
flavor_text_entries: The user bombards the target with telekinetic force. A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power of the opposing Pokémon's special moves.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Baddy bad.name: Baddy bad
flavor_text_entries: The user acts bad and attacks the target. A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power of the opposing Pokémon's physical moves.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Sappy seed.name: Sappy seed
flavor_text_entries: The user grows a gigantic stalk that scatters seeds to attack the target. The seeds drain the target's HP every turn.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Freezy frost.name: Freezy frost
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks with a crystal made of cold frozen haze. It eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Sparkly swirl.name: Sparkly swirl
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks the target by wrapping it with a whirlwind of an overpowering scent. This also heals all status conditions of the user's party.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Veevee volley.name: Veevee volley
flavor_text_entries: The more Eevee loves its Trainer, the greater the move's power. It never misses.
This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Double iron bash.name: Double iron bash
flavor_text_entries: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.
The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.

Max guard.name: Max guard
flavor_text_entries: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Dynamax cannon.name: Dynamax cannon
flavor_text_entries: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

Snipe shot.name: Snipe shot
flavor_text_entries: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

Jaw lock.name: Jaw lock
flavor_text_entries: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

Stuff cheeks.name: Stuff cheeks
flavor_text_entries: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.

No retreat.name: No retreat
flavor_text_entries: This move raises all the user's stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.

Tar shot.name: Tar shot
flavor_text_entries: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target's Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

Magic powder.name: Magic powder
flavor_text_entries: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target to Psychic type.

Dragon darts.name: Dragon darts
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.

Teatime.name: Teatime
flavor_text_entries: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

Octolock.name: Octolock
flavor_text_entries: The user locks the target in and prevents it from fleeing. This move also lowers the target's Defense and Sp. Def every turn.

Bolt beak.name: Bolt beak
flavor_text_entries: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

Fishious rend.name: Fishious rend
flavor_text_entries: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

Court change.name: Court change
flavor_text_entries: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

Max flare.name: Max flare
flavor_text_entries: This is a Fire-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user intensifies the sun for five turns.

Max flutterby.name: Max flutterby
flavor_text_entries: This is a Bug-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Max lightning.name: Max lightning
flavor_text_entries: This is an Electric-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns.

Max strike.name: Max strike
flavor_text_entries: This is a Normal-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Speed stat.

Max knuckle.name: Max knuckle
flavor_text_entries: This is a Fighting-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Attack stats.

Max phantasm.name: Max phantasm
flavor_text_entries: This is a Ghost-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Defense stat.

Max hailstorm.name: Max hailstorm
flavor_text_entries: This is an Ice-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.

Max ooze.name: Max ooze
flavor_text_entries: This is a Poison-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Sp. Atk stats.

Max geyser.name: Max geyser
flavor_text_entries: This is a Water-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns.

Max airstream.name: Max airstream
flavor_text_entries: This is a Flying-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Speed stats.

Max starfall.name: Max starfall
flavor_text_entries: This is a Fairy-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Misty Terrain for five turns.

Max wyrmwind.name: Max wyrmwind
flavor_text_entries: This is a Dragon-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

Max mindstorm.name: Max mindstorm
flavor_text_entries: This is a Psychic-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Psychic Terrain for five turns.

Max rockfall.name: Max rockfall
flavor_text_entries: This is a Rock-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a sandstorm lasting five turns.

Max quake.name: Max quake
flavor_text_entries: This is a Ground-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Sp. Def stats.

Max darkness.name: Max darkness
flavor_text_entries: This is a Dark-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

Max overgrowth.name: Max overgrowth
flavor_text_entries: This is a Grass-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns.

Max steelspike.name: Max steelspike
flavor_text_entries: This is a Steel-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Defense stats.

Clangorous soul.name: Clangorous soul
flavor_text_entries: The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.

Body press.name: Body press
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user's Defense, the more damage it can inflict on the target.

Decorate.name: Decorate
flavor_text_entries: The user sharply raises the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

Drum beating.name: Drum beating
flavor_text_entries: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum's roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

Snap trap.name: Snap trap
flavor_text_entries: The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to five turns.

Pyro ball.name: Pyro ball
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Behemoth blade.name: Behemoth blade
flavor_text_entries: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

Behemoth bash.name: Behemoth bash
flavor_text_entries: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

Aura wheel.name: Aura wheel
flavor_text_entries: Morpeko attacks and raises its Speed with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move's type changes depending on the user's form.

Breaking swipe.name: Breaking swipe
flavor_text_entries: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

Branch poke.name: Branch poke
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

Overdrive.name: Overdrive
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

Apple acid.name: Apple acid
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

Grav apple.name: Grav apple
flavor_text_entries: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

Spirit break.name: Spirit break
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Strange steam.name: Strange steam
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

Life dew.name: Life dew
flavor_text_entries: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.

Obstruct.name: Obstruct
flavor_text_entries: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession. Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker's Defense stat.

False surrender.name: False surrender
flavor_text_entries: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

Meteor assault.name: Meteor assault
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can't move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.

Eternabeam.name: Eternabeam
flavor_text_entries: This is Eternatus's most powerful attack in its original form. The user can't move on the next turn.

Steel beam.name: Steel beam
flavor_text_entries: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

Expanding force.name: Expanding force
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. This move's power goes up and damages all opposing Pokémon on Psychic Terrain.

Steel roller.name: Steel roller
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails when the ground hasn't turned into a terrain.

Scale shot.name: Scale shot
flavor_text_entries: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user's Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

Meteor beam.name: Meteor beam
flavor_text_entries: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks the target on the next turn.
